thread.title: Postgame: Avalanche can't get it done in 1-0 OT loss to 'Canes
thread.title_full: Postgame: Avalanche can't get it done in 1-0 OT loss to 'Canes

title: Postgame: Avalanche can't get it done in 1-0 OT loss to 'Canes
text:
Carolina Hurricanes , Colorado Avalanche , Jarome Iginla , Matt Duchene , NHL , Patrick Roy 
The Avalanche lost its first-ever 3-on-3 overtime. Carolina wins 1-0 at the Pepsi Center. Evolving game story is here . 
Trying to post Cam Ward’s third-period save on Matt Duchene here. Please tweet at me if you see a good one, @MikeChambers. 
Matt Duchene has just one point (goal) in six games. But he was robbed by Cam Ward’s paddle late in the third and sprung linemate Jarome Iginla for his overtime breakaway bid: 
Jarome Iginla had a glorious chance to end it: 
Noteworthy: The Avs were 5-of-5 on the penalty kill and have killed off 18 consecutive power plays. … Hurricanes won for the first time in Denver since they were the Hartford Whalers in 1995-96. 
Patrick Roy liked the fact his team only allowed 18 shots in regulation and one in OT:
